meanings.definition: A sweet, chewy candy made from sugar, butter, and milk.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of caramel in my ice cream.
meanings.sent2: She drizzled caramel over the warm apple pie.
meanings.sent3: The caramel candy was so sticky, it got stuck to my teeth!
meanings.sent4: The caramel candy melted in her mouth like a sweet dream.
meanings.sent5: The smell of caramel filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A light to dark brown color.
meanings.sent1: Her hair had a beautiful caramel hue.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in shades of caramel.
meanings.sent3: The caramel color of the walls made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The caramel tones of the painting gave it a warm feel.
meanings.sent5: The caramel color of the leaves in autumn was breathtaking.
